name: Inverted-Quality
author: thesixthroc
title: Inverted Quality (Beta)
description:
Inverts the quality system. Items start at the highest quality, Nominal, when mined or smelted. Whenever items are crafted there is a 50% chance to produce lower-quality products than the ingredients.

Three new entities are provided: Downgrade Port allows high-quality items to be used in low-quality recipes; Meltdown Facility allows the melting down of low-quality items back into Nominal-quality base materials; and a Burner Assembling Machine to avoid a softlock in the early-game.
